qas.question: Who was the first communist country to open its borders to all foreign visitors?
In what year did the first communist country open its borders to all foreign visitors?
When did Tito start promoting a peaceful resolution to the Arab-Israeli conflict?
Whose plan called for Arabs to recognize the state of Israel in exchange for territories Israel gained?
In what year did Tito start working in Arab Israeli peace processes?

context: On 1 January <a1_0><a2_0><a4_0>1967<a4_0/><a2_0/><a1_0/>, <a0_0>Yugoslavia<a0_0/> was the first communist country to open its borders to all foreign visitors and abolish visa requirements. In the same year <a3_0>Tito<a3_0/> became active in promoting a peaceful resolution of the Arab–Israeli conflict. His plan called for Arabs to recognize the state of Israel in exchange for territories Israel gained.
